question: What is the main objective of the “Mo Prativa” program launched in Odisha?
option1: To encourage doctors for their contribution to combat COVID-19
option2: To participate in online competitions during lockdown for children
option3: To engage health workers in hospitals voluntarily
answer: To participate in online competitions during lockdown for children
explanation: “Mo Prativa” program is launched in Odisha in collaboration with UNICEF to engage children (Age group of 5 to 18 years) in online competitions like drawings, writing slogans, paintings, short story writing during the lockdown due to the outbreak of COVID-19.
